frontmatter.title: Uncover what's unseen

frontmatter.title: Use the appropriate tool
frontmatter.description: Not every job requires the same tools. Take time to consider the purpose first.

frontmatter.title: Approach projects with open learning mindset
frontmatter.description: Identify common objectives and approach projects with open learning mindset.
